questions.question: What is the main purpose of the GlowBoost Vitamin C Serum?
questions.answer: The main purpose of the GlowBoost Vitamin C Serum is to provide skin benefits such as brightening and fading dark spots, thanks to its key ingredients including Vitamin C and Hyaluronic Acid. It helps to even out skin tone and reduce dullness, promoting a radiant and luminous appearance.

questions.question: Are there any potential side effects of using the GlowBoost Vitamin C Serum?
questions.answer: The GlowBoost Vitamin C Serum may cause mild tingling for sensitive skin, and users are advised to discontinue use if irritation occurs. Sensitive skin types, broken or irritated skin should avoid using this product to minimize potential side effects.

questions.question: How many drops of the GlowBoost Vitamin C Serum should I apply to my face?
questions.answer: You should apply 2-3 drops of the GlowBoost Vitamin C Serum to your face and neck in the morning. Gently massage the serum into your skin until fully absorbed, then apply sunscreen for optimal results.

questions.question: How much does the GlowBoost Vitamin C Serum cost?
questions.answer: The GlowBoost Vitamin C Serum costs ₹699. This price is for the 10% Vitamin C version of the serum, designed for oily and combination skin types.

questions.question: How does the GlowBoost Vitamin C Serum compare to other vitamin C serums on the market?
questions.answer: The GlowBoost Vitamin C Serum stands out with its 10% Vitamin C and Hyaluronic Acid ingredients, offering brightening and dark spot fading skin benefits. It is specifically suited for oily and combination skin types, with considerations for mild tingling on sensitive skin.

questions.question: I have sensitive skin, will I experience any irritation from the GlowBoost Vitamin C Serum?
questions.answer: You may experience mild tingling due to the Vitamin C ingredient, and it's recommended to discontinue use if irritation occurs, as the product is not suitable for sensitive skin types. If you have sensitive skin, it's best to avoid using the GlowBoost Vitamin C Serum or proceed with caution.

questions.question: Can I use the GlowBoost Vitamin C Serum if I have extremely sensitive skin?
questions.answer: It's not recommended to use the GlowBoost Vitamin C Serum if you have extremely sensitive skin as it may cause mild tingling and is not suitable for sensitive skin types. You should discontinue use if irritation occurs, and consider avoiding the product altogether if you have broken or irritated skin.

questions.question: At what time of day should I use the GlowBoost Vitamin C Serum?
questions.answer: You should use the GlowBoost Vitamin C Serum in the morning, applying 2-3 drops before sunscreen. This allows you to experience the skin benefits of its ingredients, including Vitamin C and Hyaluronic Acid, throughout the day.

questions.question: Do I need to apply any other products after using the GlowBoost Vitamin C Serum?
questions.answer: You should apply sunscreen after using the GlowBoost Vitamin C Serum, as it is recommended to use the serum in the morning before applying sunscreen. No other products are mentioned as required to be applied after the serum.

questions.question: How does the Vitamin C in GlowBoost Vitamin C Serum help my skin?
questions.answer: The Vitamin C in GlowBoost Vitamin C Serum helps to even out skin tone, giving your complexion a radiant and luminous appearance, and fades existing dark spots, hyperpigmentation, and acne scars. It provides brightening and skin tone evening benefits, promoting a smoother and more uniform skin texture and tone over time.

questions.question: What are the key ingredients in the GlowBoost Vitamin C Serum?
questions.answer: The key ingredients in the GlowBoost Vitamin C Serum are Vitamin C and Hyaluronic Acid. These ingredients help provide brightening and fading of dark spots benefits to the skin.

questions.question: Can the GlowBoost Vitamin C Serum help with dark spots on the skin?
questions.answer: The GlowBoost Vitamin C Serum can help with dark spots on the skin as it has the skin benefit of fading dark spots, hyperpigmentation, and acne scars, revealing a smoother, more uniform skin texture and tone over time. Its powerful antioxidant properties work to achieve this skin benefit.

questions.question: Is the GlowBoost Vitamin C Serum suitable for all skin types?
questions.answer: The GlowBoost Vitamin C Serum is targeted towards oily and combination skin types, it may not be suitable for all skin types, especially sensitive skin which may experience mild tingling. It is recommended for users with oily or combination skin.

questions.question: Is the GlowBoost Vitamin C Serum available for purchase online?
questions.answer: The product information provided does not mention the availability of the GlowBoost Vitamin C Serum for online purchase. It only lists the price as ₹699, but does not specify where it can be bought.

questions.question: Is the 10% Vitamin C concentration in the GlowBoost Vitamin C Serum more effective than lower concentrations?
questions.answer: The product information does not compare the effectiveness of the 10% Vitamin C concentration to lower concentrations, it only lists the key features and benefits of the GlowBoost Vitamin C Serum. The 10% Vitamin C concentration is a key ingredient that provides brightening and dark spot fading skin benefits.
